org.archive.io.arc

类 ARCWriterTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.archive.util.TmpDirTestCase
          • org.archive.io.arc.ARCWriterTest
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    junit.framework.Test, ARCConstants, ArchiveFileConstants

    public class ARCWriterTest
extends TmpDirTestCase
implements ARCConstants
    Test ARCWriter class. This code exercises ARCWriter AND ARCReader. First it writes ARCs w/ ARCWriter. Then it validates what was written w/ ARCReader.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ARCWriterTest.CorruptibleARCWriter
      Utility class for writing bad ARCs (with trailing junk)

      • createARCFile

        public static java.io.File createARCFile(java.io.File arcdir,
                         boolean compress)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Write an arc file for other tests to use.
        参数:
        arcdir - Directory to write to.
        compress - True if file should be compressed.
        返回:
        ARC written.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
